sentence: And soon the Earth was covered with plastic bags and aluminum cans and paper plates and disposable bottles and there was nowhere to sit down or walk, and Man shook his head and cried: Look at this Godawful mess'.? title: goes after Liz Cheney's seat

sentence: The Republican National Committee recently censured GOP Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger for their work on the House committee investigating the riot.
author: Kate Scanlon
title: Minnesota GOP attorney general hopeful boasts staffers were Jan. 6 participants

sentence: The Republican National Committee recently censured GOP Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger for their work on the House committee investigating the riot.
author: Kate Scanlon
title: Minnesota GOP attorney general hopeful boasts staffers were Jan. 6 participants

sentence: Stefanik, a formerly (and putatively) moderate House member, leveraged her fealty to Trump to earn a promotion to the House conference chair after minority leader Kevin McCarthy booted Liz Cheney from the number-three GOP slot over Cheney's role in investigating January 6.
author: Tom Gogola
title: And the Winner of a Safe Seat in Congress Is Elise Stefanik!

sentence: Stefanik, a formerly (and putatively) moderate House member, leveraged her fealty to Trump to earn a promotion to the House conference chair after minority leader Kevin McCarthy booted Liz Cheney from the number-three GOP slot over Cheney's role in investigating January 6.
author: Tom Gogola
title: And the Winner of a Safe Seat in Congress Is Elise Stefanik!
